wikipedia_page.main: Paul Mooney (7 April 1901 – 19 October 1980) was a Scottish professional footballer who played in the Scottish League for East Stirlingshire and made 283 appearances in the English Football League for Brighton & Hove Albion. He played as a centre half.

link_mentions.page: List of association footballers who died while playing
response: |Died after a clash of heads with Brighton & Hove Albion's Paul Mooney in a game, who subsequently retired.
* Paul Mooney (rugby union) (1930–2006), Australian rugby union player
